Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and price”

Reviews.Content: wife visit barcelona usually choose hotels close city center time stayed hotel barcelona impressed location amazing paseo de gracia steps catalonia square considering bargain bright considering location noisy doubt satying hotel barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Didn't meet my expectations”

Reviews.Content: stayed husa hotels seville madrid perfect realized experience bad location couldnt remodeled shown pictures feeling booked nonsmoking smelled disguised tobacco smell didnt days window beds little hard else

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Noisy - even with earplugs!”
Reviews.Author: NHBookworm
Reviews.Content: guess depends youre live city sleep lot traffic noise wouldnt mind travel portable sound machines earplugs usually dont hotel firmly shut locked noise vibration traffic night impossible sleep mattress cheap hard uncomfortable rough night family experience decide stay anyway extra pillows soon check bed comfortable block ears bring own conditioner soap bring earplugs extra towels theyre thin youll breakfast included edible tasty dont remember staying worse hotel seriously

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: logan33961
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights front desk accommodating hotel situated city center block catalunya square 2 blocks la ramblas clean hotel handicap stroller friendly taxi airport aerobus available 5 min starting 530 am block hotel husa cost 530 euro person compared taxi cost 2400 euros maximum 4 passengers taxi strictly enforce tipping optional buy 2 day pass hop hop tour cheaper 3000 euros preferably barcelona tour company

Reviews.Title: “Great Location.Very noisy at night”
Reviews.Author: kalypso4
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hot window streets cleaned rubbish removed night lot street noise 4am location getting mini bar poor bathroom clean adequate cafes opposite taxis cheap driver address name hotel gps

Reviews.Title: “Great location!!”

Reviews.Content: location hotel excellent near aeroport bus stop placa catalunya near la rambla theres nice coffee shop street called spacious bathroom huge clean theres mini roomsafe bed comfortable staff speaks english helpful definitely

Reviews.Title: “Very central”

Reviews.Content: centrally located plaza catalonia ramblas nice property basic amenities value money comfortable stay location central walk metro ramblas gothic quarter sagrada familia hotel bus ride la village low cost fashion shopping ride park aventura fun

Reviews.Content: looking central hotel look location ideal placa de catalunya aero bus stops 150 metres 5 euros plenty food options near versed english hotel clean staff speak english palatial 7th floor balcony look catalunya square 45 degrees stay time barcalona
